name: Triple Arrows
description: You fire three arrows at the target. Make three ranged attacks against the same target in range, each dealing 1d4 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit.

The first attack critical hits on nat 19s and 20s. The second attack lowers the target's AC by 1 if it hits until the end of combat (stacks up to 5 times). The third attack flinches the target on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
